title: VA - Unforgettable Lovesongs 2007 - 2cd
description:
'Unforgettable Lovesongs' is a cosy and warm retrospective.
This nostalgic collection of classic lovesongs features the biggest
and best names from the 50's and will melt the hearts of those
that grew up with these artists.

The perfect gift for lovers and for Valentines day.
